name: Enhanced Defense
description: A suit of armor or a shield gains a +1 bonus to AC while infused.

name: Enhanced Weapon
description: A simple or martial weapon gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Repeating Shot
description: A ranged weapon ignores the Loading property and produces its own ammunition. It gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

name: Returning Weapon
description: A thrown weapon returns to the wielderâ€™s hand immediately after being used to make a ranged attack.

name: Replicate Magic Item
description: You replicate the effects of a common magic item of your choice.

name: Mind Sharpener
description: The wearer can succeed on a failed Constitution saving throw to maintain concentration, a limited number of times per day.

name: Enhanced Arcane Focus
description: An arcane focus grants a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls.

name: Boots of the Winding Path
description: As a bonus action, the wearer can teleport up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space they previously occupied.

name: Homunculus Servant
description: You create a magical construct companion that obeys your commands.

name: Radiant Weapon
description: The weapon sheds light and can blind creatures when it hits.

name: Resistant Armor
description: The wearer gains resistance to one damage type of your choice.

name: Spell-Refueling Ring
description: The wearer can recover a spell slot of 3rd level or lower once per day.
